text: Thomas Morgan Woodward (September 16, 1925 - February 22, 2019) was an American actor. Woodward was best known for his returning role on the soap opera Dallas as Marvin "Punk" Anderson. He also played the silent Boss Godfrey (the Walking Boss) in Cool Hand Luke (1967), and had the most guest appearances on Gunsmoke. His career began in 1956. Woodward guest starred in two different episodes of the original series of Star Trek as two different characters. Woodward was born in Fort Worth, Texas. He studied at the University of Texas at Austin and at the University of Texas at Arlington. He retired from acting in 1998. Woodward died at his home in Hollywood Hills, California from prostate cancer on February 22, 2019 at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Fort Worth, Texas
title: Morgan Woodward
